synopsis.text: Junk Dog, a skilled underground boxer with no name or past, ekes out a living in a desolate city of poverty by rigging Megalobox matches with his partner Gansaku Nanbu. Megalobox, an evolution of boxing that utilizes mechanical limbs for enhanced speed and power, is Junk Dog's only solace in a life filled with frustration and dissatisfaction. Meanwhile, the wealthy and ambitious Yukiko Shirato organizes Megalonia, a prestigious Megalobox tournament, to promote her family's brand and further her career. Reigning champion Yuuri, a disciplined and virtuous fighter, is set to win the tournament under Yukiko's control. When Junk Dog crosses paths with Yuuri, he is challenged to earn the right to face him in the ring. Adopting the name "Joe," Junk Dog embarks on a thrilling journey to climb the ranks and face his newfound rival in the ultimate showdown of skill and determination.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
